ing: 1 (12 ounce) can solid white tuna packed in water, drained
3 green onions, thinly sliced, plus additional for garnish
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
des: "Living in Spain I have come across a literal plethora of tapas.  This is a light, healthy tapa that goes best with crisp white wines and crunchy bread. This recipe is great for experimenting with a variety of different vegetables, spices, and vinegars."
ins: Stir together tuna, mayonnaise, green onions, red pepper, and balsamic vinegar in a bowl. Season with pepper and garlic salt, then pack the avocado halves with the tuna mixture. Garnish with reserved green onions and a dash of black pepper before serving.
